Nightshift throws himself into reverse, spins on his tires and then throws =
his shift into drive and rolls off at an alarmingly fast speed.

" I dunno =
what happened but it sure ain't good.  Hold on, it's gonna be a bumpy ride!=
" 

He takes off over rough terrain, hoping to stump Dark Rodimus and slow =
him down.

Tucson looks back to Hydras.

" I have to get Noctorro to safety=
,  You'll have to cover for me for a while ."

Perpetually on the move and =
constantly busy.

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift throws himself into reverse=
, spins on his tires and then throws his shift into drive and rolls off at =
an alarmingly fast speed.</div><div><br></div><div>" I dunno what happened =
but it sure ain't good.  Hold on, it's gonna be a bumpy ride!" </=
div><div><br></div><div>He takes off over rough terrain, hoping to stump Da=
rk Rodimus and slow him down.</div><div><br></div><div>Tucson looks back to=
 Hydras.</div><div><br></div><div>" I have to get Noctorro to safety, &nbsp=
;You'll have to cover for me for a while ."<br><br>Perpetually on the move =
and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Aug 13, 2011, at 2:16 PM, Airsh=
adow Nightstar <<a href=3D"mailto:airly2002@...">airly2002@hotma=
il.com</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><di=
v>




<span style=3D"display:none"> </span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-te=
xt">
      
      
      <p>Hydras/Talon/Nightlight/Elita:<br>
<br>
"What h=
appened to My daddy!!!???"said Elita almost sobbing<br>
<br>
**************=
************<br>
<br>
"I heard that"said Nighlight while she looked as if s=
he where to have a <br>
nervous break down"he is... his dark side has came =
back isnt?... What <br>
happened??"<br>
<br>
***************************<br=
>
<br>
"So Prime are you leaving us?"hissed hydras"Unlucky, Cyclonus is mis=
sing too <br>
and an old pal is willing to help, and this is over us"<br>
<=
br>
Hydras send an encoded message that said "we have to allied to MAximals=
 in <br>
order to deal with this, Dark Rodimus is back and not under my con=
trol" then <br>
he send another encoded to Scourge "Keep an eye in the chil=
d, in a driscrete <br>
way"<br>
<br>
**************************<br>
<br>
Ta=
lon was shocked about the last things that had happened and followed <br>
T=
ucson in silence<br>
<br>
-----Mensaje original----- <br>
From: Sandy Panic=
o<br>
Sent: Saturday, August 13, 2011 8:48 AM<br>
To: <a href=3D"mailto:nbw=
rpg%40yahoogroups.com"><a href=3D"mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com</a></a><br>
Subject: Re: Strange meetings - new friends & =
old enemies<br>
<br>
Straight Shot turns her attentions to Nightshift and r=
emains hidden to see <br>
what he would do next.  Like him, the sight of Da=
rk Rodimus was enough to <br>
dim her trust in the real Rodimus Prime as sh=
e remembers what had happened <br>
to him in the past.  She opens a com lin=
k to Tucson directly.<br>
<br>
" Tucson, it's me, look, I think ya might ha=
ve ta take leadership privileges <br>
away from Rodimus.  He's turned evil =
again.  And I don't think Nightshift or <br>
anyone else is gonna trust him=
 after this.  I know I won't. "<br>
<br>
Tucson gets her call while holding=
 onto Noctorro, flying him back to where <br>
the other injured Fuzors are =
to stand guard until help got to them.  His <br>
eyes narrow.<br>
<br>
" I =
was afraid of this, Noctorro.  Rodimus has been taken again.  Straight <br>=

Shot is right, he can't be trusted.  And he accuses me of not being in my =
<br>
right of mind..  Not good, not good at all."<br>
<br>
He continues his=
 flight while carefully tending to his comrade.<br>
<br>
" Leo Prime, I am =
flying Noctorro back to the damaged Fuzors and I will <br>
stand guard with=
 them until help arrives.  In the mean time, Rodimus has <br>
fallen back i=
nto evil hands and I think it's best if he is barred from <br>
leadership d=
uties until further notice.  I don't like being this harsh, but <br>
right =
now he can't be trusted.  Tell Bump to secure Nightlight in the med <br>
ba=
y and put the Ark in immediate lockdown. We can't afford to take any <br>
c=
hances."<br>
<br>
Nightshift continues to keep his doors locked and engine =
in drive for quick <br>
escape if need be.  He wasn't about to let Dark Rod=
imus get to Elita.  If <br>
anything he knew that returning her to the Ark =
would also put his other <br>
comrades at risk.  That too was out of the qu=
estion.<br>
<br>
" I don't think so, Punk, you ain't puttn one mean aft han=
d on anyone if I <br>
can help it!  You gotta outrun me first before ya eve=
n THINK about gett'n <br>
your hands on her!   Hold on tight kid, I think w=
e're in for a little car <br>
chase."<br>
<br>
Perpetually on the move and =
constantly busy.<br>
<br>

t;OLD - Straight Shot><br>
